hero.title: Mastering the Scene Before the First Tape is Laid
hero.subtitle: High-stakes forensic training in a zero-risk environment. Develop precision, maintain chain-of-custody protocols, and sharpen investigative instincts through hyper-realistic simulations.

toolkit.title: The Investigative Toolkit
toolkit.subtitle: Advanced VR technology for precision forensic training

features.title: Haptic Evidence Collection
features.desc: Using specialized controllers to feel the 'weight' and 'resistance' of objects to practice delicate recovery techniques.

features.title: Dynamic Motion Effects
features.desc: Simulating environmental stressors (shifting ground, unstable structures) to train focus under pressure.

features.title: Procedural Accuracy
features.desc: Built-in checklists that track if a participant follows legal and safety protocols in real-time.

pillars.title: The Tactical Pillars
pillars.subtitle: Building investigative excellence through immersive training

items.title: Risk-Free Error Correction
items.desc: Allowing trainees to make 'fatal' procedural mistakes in VR so they never make them in the field.

items.title: Infinite Scene Variability
items.desc: Generating thousands of randomized crime scene layouts—from residential to industrial—ensuring officers never 'memorize' the test.

items.title: Performance Playback
items.desc: A 'Review Mode' where instructors can fly through the scene and point out missed evidence or safety lapses.

stakeholders.title: Who Benefits from Tactical VR Training
stakeholders.subtitle: Specialized solutions for law enforcement and forensic professionals

items.benefit: Accelerating the 'rookie' learning curve with consistent, repeatable training scenarios that build foundational investigative skills.
Mastering specialized techniques like blood-spatter analysis or ballistics in a controlled 3D space with unlimited practice opportunities.
Preparing for high-risk warrants, chemical scenes, and other critical situations that are too dangerous or rare to practice in real life.

metrics.title: Real-Time Performance Tracking
metrics.subtitle: Dashboard overlay showing critical metrics for every training session

whyMelzo.title: Why Melzo: Legally Defensible Training
whyMelzo.subtitle: Melzo's data tracking provides a verifiable audit trail of an officer's competency and adherence to standard operating procedures (SOPs). Every action is logged, timestamped, and available for review—ensuring training meets legal and departmental standards.
